config.morph.cat.morph.name: Morph Ability
config.morph.prop.morphTime.name: Morph Time
config.morph.prop.morphTime.desc: Time (in ticks) for a morph to complete.
config.morph.prop.disabledMobs.name: Disabled Mobs
config.morph.prop.disabledMobs.desc: Resource Location name for Mob types you cannot acquire biomass or morphs from.
config.morph.prop.supportedAttributes.de: Which attributes are supported by more, and how are values better. Format: <Resource Name of Attribute>;<more/less>. EG: "minecraft:generic.max_health;more".
config.morph.prop.morphClassic.name: Morph Classic
config.morph.prop.morphClassic.desc: Enable this for Morph Classic. No Biomass or Morph restrictions.
config.morph.prop.aggressiveSizeRecalcul: Morph normally only recalculates size when it has to. This makes Morph recalculate the player size every tick whilst morphed.
